page.title: 16MYTTON & FITZ-GENERAL
page.content:
{ {MYTTON & FITZ}_ RELIGION The village of Fitz has only one church.This belongs to the Church of England. The vicar of Fitz does not live in the village any longer and the church shares him with other local villages.
{INFORMATION { }There are few information services in Mitton & Fitz.A library van visits the villages once a week on a Wednesday from Shrewsbury library. { {COMMUNICATIONS Most houses in the area have their own telrphones and there are post boxes in both villages.A refuse cart comes once a week & a mobile library comes every Wednesday.A travelling shop comes 3x a week.
